title: make uninstall leaves behind broken sym-links in bin, lib

content.raw:
When attampting to uninstall with make uninstall, there are a bunch of broken symbolic links to executables and libraries.

In bin:
gazebo    gzfactory  gzphysics  gzsensor  gzstats
gzclient  gzmaster   gzsdf      gzserver  gztopic

In lib:
lib/libgazebo_ccd.so          lib/libgazebo_physics_ode.so
lib/libgazebo_ccd.so.1        lib/libgazebo_physics_ode.so.1
lib/libgazebo_common.so       lib/libgazebo_physics.so
lib/libgazebo_common.so.1     lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
lib/libgazebo_gimpact.so      lib/libgazebo_rendering.so
lib/libgazebo_gimpact.so.1    lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
lib/libgazebo_gui.so          lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so
lib/libgazebo_gui.so.1        lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
lib/libgazebo_math.so         lib/libgazebo_selection_buffer.so
lib/libgazebo_math.so.1       lib/libgazebo_selection_buffer.so.1
lib/libgazebo_msgs.so         lib/libgazebo_sensors.so
lib/libgazebo_msgs.so.1       lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
lib/libgazebo_ode.so          lib/libgazebo_skyx.so
lib/libgazebo_ode.so.1        lib/libgazebo_skyx.so.1
lib/libgazebo_opcode.so       lib/libgazebo.so
lib/libgazebo_opcode.so.1     lib/libgazebo.so.1
lib/libgazebo_opende_ou.so    lib/libgazebo_transport.so
lib/libgazebo_opende_ou.so.1  lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
content.html:
When attampting to uninstall with make uninstall, there are a bunch of broken symbolic links to executables and libraries.

In bin: gazebo gzfactory gzphysics gzsensor gzstats gzclient gzmaster gzsdf gzserver gztopic

In lib: lib/libgazebo_ccd.so lib/libgazebo_physics_ode.so lib/libgazebo_ccd.so.1 lib/libgazebo_physics_ode.so.1 lib/libgazebo_common.so lib/libgazebo_physics.so lib/libgazebo_common.so.1 lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1 lib/libgazebo_gimpact.so lib/libgazebo_rendering.so lib/libgazebo_gimpact.so.1 lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1 lib/libgazebo_gui.so lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so lib/libgazebo_gui.so.1 lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1 lib/libgazebo_math.so lib/libgazebo_selection_buffer.so lib/libgazebo_math.so.1 lib/libgazebo_selection_buffer.so.1 lib/libgazebo_msgs.so lib/libgazebo_sensors.so lib/libgazebo_msgs.so.1 lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1 lib/libgazebo_ode.so lib/libgazebo_skyx.so lib/libgazebo_ode.so.1 lib/libgazebo_skyx.so.1 lib/libgazebo_opcode.so lib/libgazebo.so lib/libgazebo_opcode.so.1 lib/libgazebo.so.1 lib/libgazebo_opende_ou.so lib/libgazebo_transport.so lib/libgazebo_opende_ou.so.1 lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
